name: Magic Miner
description:
Fight the radioactive golem that has taken over the Mage's Mine! 

Oh mighty Mage. We have received word that our precious magium mine has been plauged with foul monsters~!

We humbly ask for your assisstance in taking them down. We've lost so many soldiers down there that we have no other choice. Please be careful down there as the magium has some odd effects in large abundances.

Your Stability Bar (in blue) serves as your health.

When between 40%-60% - Your spell attack get impowered.

When less than 40% - Normal

Fireballs and Zaps

When above 60% - Watch out!

Your empowerment drops

and magic become unstable!

Controls! 

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

Left Click - Triple Fire Ball

Right Click - Short Range Zap

Shift - Dash

Esc - Pause
